Mozzamel hossain

samirmac333@gmail.com
                                                                                                                                          LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/cvshealth/
Summary  
Over 8 years of IT experience in the QA field- excellent expertise in health care, insurance and Banking Domains. 
With Analyzing, managing, designing, and implementation of QA Testing Strategy for Web Based and Mobile 
Applications.
excellent ability to understand business and IT solutions in all phases of SDLC and STLC. 
Experience in manual and automation testing using Selenium, as well as mobile testing with Perfecto and 
GigaFox QA Lab.
Healthcare domain subject matter expertise in member, provider, auto approval, EDI transactions, care 
management, utilization management, enrollment, and community resource directory.
Responsible for configuring, testing, maintaining, enhancing, and supporting HIPPA X12 EDI (278, 276,

management, utilization management, enrollment, and community resource directory.
Responsible for configuring, testing, maintaining, enhancing, and supporting HIPPA X12 EDI (278, 276, 
277, 270, 271)
Experience of different testing approaches to functional, system, smoke, regression, and database testing.
Expertise in Automation testing using Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, Maven and CI tool Jenkins. 
Experience in testing web services using the Rest API with Rest Assured and Postman. 
Experience with Scrum, SAFE Agile and Waterfall Methodologies
hands-on experience to co-ordinate with the onsite and offshore 10+ Resources.
excellent communication skills; professional and collaboration skills; self-motivation; interest in learning 
new testing practices and staying current on market needs and technologies
Experience
Aetna CVS health- Hartford, CT. 
E2E QA Lead, June 2017 to present.

new testing practices and staying current on market needs and technologies
Experience
Aetna CVS health- Hartford, CT. 
E2E QA Lead, June 2017 to present. 
performed review and analysis of functional and Automation testing requirements and lead in developing 
test plan design, Estimation and documentation and Execution.
  configured and written automation scripts using Selenium with a page object model (POM) design 
pattern.
Working with business and Client to co-ordinate for UAT as well as review/Accept future requirement and 
lead 10+ offshore and onshore team. 
Actively testing mobile and iPad applications using a simulator using Gigafox
Working with UM (Utilization management), including L0, L2, and L3 approval. subject matter expertise in 
member, provider, auto approval, Authorization, Case management, EDI transactions, care management, 
enrollment, and community resource directory.

member, provider, auto approval, Authorization, Case management, EDI transactions, care management,

Participating in Testing, Planning, Bug Resolution, Automation, Troubleshooting, and Reporting.
In-depth knowledge of automation using methods like Screen Shot class, drag and drop, mouse hover, 
select/action class, as well as I-frame, Exception Handling, and Synchronization.
used Jenkins for continuous integration tests, adding suites and running scripts on the server. 
Hands- on experience in TestNG, Maven and Java, and in Rally and Jira for bug tracking as well as database 
testing using MySQL and DB2.

Analyzing data using Splunk, also proficient with using Mainframe application. participating in  PI planning 
and daily standup to update testing and resolve issues.
Expertise in a variety of healthcare applications, including ATV, Medcompass, Community Resource 
Directory, Evicore, and Availity.
Citi Bank-NYC
Test Analyst, 03/2014 - 05/2017
worked on stock plan services, including ESPP integrated with Fidelity.
engaged in a wealth management system and has expertise in loan procedures for FHA and conventional. 
Tractability Matrix to track and perform functional, integration, unit, UAT, smoke testing, regression 
testing, black box testing.
